item.title: About Me
item.description: Hey there! My name is Natalie. I’m a blockchain developer, and I love it. I’m also a blogger - and at times, have a passion for writing (other times, I’ve just got a brick wall that I can’t get past). I was first introduced to Blockchain at ETHWaterloo, where I built a P2P System where I learnt a whole lot about the blockchain space. I became passionate about learning more and understanding more about the technology.

item.title: George Brown
item.description: The following content contains slides for the George Brown Blockchain Program. Dapps 1 - June 2019 Secret Management Ethers Hands on Ethers Hands on Express Design Patterns - May 2019 Testing Smart Contracts Mocha, Asserts, and More Testing Screen share: https://hangouts.google.com/call/4a1qojIuldm-irS98avjAEEE Smart Contract Essentials - May 2019 Deeper Dive into Solidity Introduction to Vyper Inheritance - Solidity Exam Review

item.title: Smart Contract Security
item.description: Storing your cryptocurrency in a private wallet vs a smart contract wallet

Testing Smart Contracts Agenda Testing Principles Embark Mocha Setup TESTING: Primary purpose of Software Developer VERY LITTLE TIME SPENT ON WRITING SOLIDITY/VYPER COMPARED TO WRITING TESTS Test Driven Development Understand business requirements Created automated tests that meet said requirement Create code logic that implements feature Once the tests pass, the code logic is complete Refactor code for readability and maintainability, and rerun tests to ensure you did not break anything

Testing Smart Contracts body { font-family: "Helvetica Neue", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; } h1, h2, h3 { font-weight: 400; margin-bottom: 0; } .remark-slide-content h1 { font-size: 3em; } .remark-slide-content h2 { font-size: 2em; } .remark-slide-content h3 { font-size: 1.6em; } .footnote { position: absolute; bottom: 3em; } li p { line-height: 1.25em; } .red { color: #fa0000; } .large { font-size: 2em; } a, a code { color: rgb(249, 38, 114); text-decoration: none; } code { background: none repeat scroll 0 0 #F8F8FF; border: 1px solid #DEDEDE; border-radius: 3px ; padding: 0 0.
